name: Stress
title: Stress
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Stress.),(Data Element Scope: Determination of the person's perceived stress level),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes GROUP codes for Stress.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Stress.)
